case.state: ... Holy shit, am I, like, one of your favorite characters or somethin'?! Oh my god, thank you!
Wow, you must really like me, huh, ~player~? I dunno what to say...
Let's keep on rockin' together, ~player~!
At this rate, I oughta teach ya how to play somethin' so you can be part of the band, ~player~!
I think we can officially call ya a Melting Dreamscape roadie, ~player~! But that also means ya gotta help us set up our gear now!

Hey, real quick, you know there are other people to play with, right, ~player~? I mean, I appreciate that ya keep pickin' me, but I just want to make sure you don't think you're stuck with me or somethin'.
Did'ja get all my collectibles yet, ~player~? I would expect ya already did by now! They ain't hard.
Oh, it's you again, ~player~. You must've enjoyed my performance, eh? Glad to hear that!
Good to see ya again, ~player~! Are ya ready to rock some more?
Hey, ~player~. Did'ja enjoy that photo I gave ya, or did'ja enjoy that photo? Gah ha!... But seriously, I hope ya liked it! It's a one-of-a-kind, so don't lose it!
Oh, uh, sorry, ~player~, I don't got any more sexy photos to give you...

♪Johnny rosin up your bow and play your fiddle hard, cuz Hell's broke loose in Georgia and the devil deals the cards, and if you win you get this shiny fiddle made of gold, but if you lose the devil gets your soul~!♪

♪Johnny did you ever know that time keeps marchin' on, the coldest hour is the one comes just before the dawn, the devil's back in Georgia will you stand up to the test, or will you let the devil be the best?♪
Yoooo! It's me, Critical Darling, comin' at'cha as live as can be! Who's ready to rock?
'Sup? Who's ready to get their butt handed to 'em by me and my ice powers?... Oh, this ain't a fight...?
This ain't no hologram! It's the real Critical Darling, live and in-person! Who's ready to get rocked?
'Sup? It's ya girl, Critical Darling, famed rock star and pro wrestler! Are ya ready to rock?
Hey, don't expect me to smash my guitar when we're done, 'kay? I respect my instruments!
It's me, Ibuki Akiyama, AKA Icebreath, AAKA Critical Darling! Who's ready to go sub-zero?
It's me, Ibuki Akiyama, AKA Icebreath, AAKA Critical Darling, but not AKA Grape Girl. I got nothin' to do with grapes, I mean, c'mon...
Yo, Critical Darling here... What? You don't get it? My songs are "critical darlings," and I'm pretty darling too, see? It's like... a pun or somethin'.
Yo, Critical Darling here... What? You don't get it? See, a "critical darling" is somethin' that did well with critics but didn't draw in a big audience, just like me and my band, Melting Dreamscape!
I'm gonna rock your faces off and win that prize money!... Oh, there's no prize?... Well, I'll still rock your faces off, and then... you can tell your friends, or somethin'...
Hey, real quick, how much does this gig pay?... It doesn't?... Well, at least you're bein' real with me and not tellin' me I'll be "paid in exposure."
Gah ha! Talk about bein' "paid in exposure!..." You get it? Cuz we're not getting paid, and we'll be exposin' ourselves...? No? Not funny?
Ever wrestle with a rock star before? Or rock out with a wrestler, for that matter? Well this is your chance to do either of those things!
The name's Critical Darling, and if ya haven't heard of me, that's okay cuz not everyone listens to the same music or watches wrestling! See? I'm an understandin' gal.
If ya haven't heard of me, that's alright! I never heard of La Dragonesa 'til she kicked my butt! But don't worry, I'm not gonna kick your butts!
If ya haven't heard of me... well, I don't blame ya. It's hard to get famous, man!
Hey, if any of ya have actually heard of me or my band before, I'll give ya a free boob flash before we start! No lyin', now! We're usin' the honor system!

Heh heh! This plan is brilliant! None of y'all will be able to forget me or my band once ya see me naked, and y'all won't be able to resist tellin' your friends! It's the best marketing campaign in the world!
Heh heh! This plan is brilliant! No one ever forgets about the rock stars they've seen naked, and they can't resist tellin' all their friends about it! It's the best marketing campaign in the world!
♪What is coming has begun, it's somethin' that you gotta see! We lie and say that it's too late for some redemption!♪
♪Once again we got suffocated in a sick perversion of a spider's web!♪ Well, I got the perverted part right, but I'm pretty sure we're not stuck in a spider's web!
♪Here's an unexplainable one!♪ How the heck did I get here? I don't have a habit of gettin' lost or anything.
Good thing y'all got me and not that Nero Forte guy! I hear he's a real downer. Also he's dead, so he wouldn't be any fun anyway!
Good thing y'all got me and not Elevator Girl! She's all stoic and stuff. Totally not fun to hang around. Plus, she doesn't even have elevator powers. Lame!
Good thing y'all got me and not, like, Dr. Worm or something! He's not a real doctor but he is a real worm -- like, an actual worm! I've seen him in person! He's crazy!
Good thing y'all got me and not, like... John Flansburgh!... Nah, that's not true. Even I wish I were John Flansburgh instead...
I got a real good feelin' about this match! Even if there's no prize, I got a feelin' that we won't be crashin' in my uncle's RV tonight!
It's me, Critical Darling. Yes, the one that got beat by La Dragonesa... But hey, I beat a buncha dudes before losin' to her!
Me: Ibuki Akiyama. My band: Melting Dreamscape. You: Probably gonna see me naked, but probably also gonna see my band play after this.
On a scale from Gilgamesh to Hammurabi, I'm feelin' pretty Hammurabi right now! Let's get this show on the road!
Hey, real quick, in case you're wonderin', these things hangin' off my skirt here? They're suspenders. A lotta people don't get that for some reason.
Y'all are gonna get to see just how good with my fingers I am! Cuz I suck at poker... But I do got guitar skills!
Any chance the winner of this will get a golden fiddle?... No?... Well, at least I'm not bettin' my soul either...
I'll take your bet, and you're gonna regret, cuz I'm the best there's ever been!
♪On a cold winter morning, in the time before the light, in flames of death's eternal reign we ride towards the fight!♪
I'm probably not the Ibuki you're hopin' for, but I hope you enjoy playin' with me anyway!
♪I'll! Teach you! Who! Rocks! It's me! It's me!♪
♪Liar! Killer! Demon! Back to the River Aras! Someone's blank stare deemed it warfare!♪
What the fuck?! Me?! How?!
Whoa! Wait, what?! Me?! I can't clone myself, I swear!
Aw man, I thought I was one of a kind. Guess not...
Doppelganger, impersonator, or secret power I never knew I had...? Nah, probably just ~player~ fuckin' with some stuff.
Aw, ~player~, did ya go outta your way to play with more than one'a me? Ya really can't get enough of me, eh? I dunno what to say...
Gah ha! At least now I can sing harmonies with myself!
Imagine how freakin' mind-blowing it'd be to pull this reveal on stage. I'm standin' up there, playin' like normal, then another me walks out? That'd be epic!
♪I'm Ibuki, yes I'm the real Ibuki, all you other Ibukis are just imitatin', so won't the real Ibuki please stand up, please stand up, please stand up!♪
Huh. I don't got a good feelin' about this match. I don't normally get bad feelin's about things...
Oh, uh, yeah, sure, sorry. This good?
I know, right? It's so hard to get famous!
I totally know you! You're that guy! The one with the sword, and the cape, and the giant robot!... I mean, not that guy with the sword and the cape and the giant robot, but the other guy! That guy!
Yeah! No limits! ANYTHING CAN BE AN INSTRUMENT! ROCK OUT TO THE SONG OF YOUR HEART!
Yeah! No limits! ANYTHING CAN BE AN INSTRUMENT! EVEN MAYONNAISE! ROCK OUT TO THE SONG OF YOUR HEART!
Who's up for some ice-cold Kool-Aid! I got the ice! Y'all can drink it all, though, cuz I don't like cherry flavored stuff!
Oh man! Too bad this ain't a fight. Beatin' up the Kool-Aid guy would be such a cool story to tell people!
Nuh-uh! Nope! I don't trust that plushie! There's totally some kinda eldritch monster hidin' in it!
No no no! Someone get that plushie outta here! At best there's a bomb in it, and at worst there's a face-eatin' eldritch monster hidin' inside!
I don't trust talkin' plushies! That's how you get tricked into some kinda death trap! He's totally gonna try to trap us in a fun-house or somethin'!
"Glass Joe?" That name doesn't inspire much confidence, dude! You gotta change it to, like, "Metal Joe" or somethin'!
"Glass Joe...?" Oh, like "Glass Canon," right? Ya don't gotta take hits if ya dish 'em fast and hard enough, right?
Sorry, bud, but if suction cups are all ya got, my money's on the other guy every time! Toyslinger's plunger guns didn't get him far, so I don't got much faith in yours!
Ugh, no pasta for me, thanks. When your tourin' budget is basically zero, you eat way too much ramen...
No pasta for me, thanks. I had ramen for lunch... and dinner yesterday... and lunch yesterday too... I don't eat well...
You don't, like, only cook spaghetti, right? I'm gettin' kinda sick of pasta, but I'd kill for a nice burger.
You don't got any powers, huh? That's okay. Havin' powers ain't all it's cracked up to be. This ice won't get me the stardom I dream of! Not musically, anyway.
I know it's, like, the stereotypical punk thing to do, but I never skip school. Education is important, yo!
Hey, even normal gals can be special! Ya don't need ice powers like me! Just look at Cherry Bomb or La Escarabajo! If ya ain't extraordinary, make yourself extraordinary!
♪If everyone's so special then maybe you can't be what you want to be, even through the falseness and contempt you breed! Your life is yours so live each day, do you need to be special to feel okay?♪
Honestly? If that were my car, I'd sell it. Tourin' in an RV ain't great, but it's better than tourin' in an old car.
Yeah, we already tried the whole "tourin' in a car" thing with my band. It sucks, dude. So cramped!
Tourin' in a car's all fun and game's 'til someone jams their boob on a peghead...
Yeah, tourin' in a car's fun, if ya like being buried under your gear. I didn't mind it 'til my legs fell asleep...
Aw man, couldn't we have gotten the car from a cool song, like Black Sunshine or somethin'?
Emily? Is that you? What's with that getup? I thought you dropped the school girl look!
"Default-chan?" What happened to "Smash Hit," Emily? Now the rest of us gotta think up new nicknames so they all fit the same theme again!
Yoooo! It's Ribbon Girl! Hey, do ya think ya can help me get a record deal...?
Yeah! This guy gets it! Let's get this show on the road! Let's rock and roll!
"Derpy Hooves...?" Dang, that'd make a great band name. I wonder if it's too late to change...
Aw... Muffin... I want a muffin... Haven't been able to have one lately. My breakfasts have all been dry cereal lately...
Oh, my, gosh! A genie! Yes! Three wishes! Okay, I wish I had wings, and I wish my band was successful!... I'll figure the last one out later...
Yes! Three wishes! Let's see... I wish I had wings, I wish my band was successful, and... I dunno what to use the third wish for...
You're some kinda evil sand witch, right? You just met your match! Sand is totally week to ice! Everybody knows that!
You're some kinda evil sand witch, right? Oh! Haha! Sandwich... Aw, dang it, now I'm hungry... Anyone happen to bring any sandwiches...?
Out of all the mascots to see strip, Mister Clean... kinda makes sense. I mean, at least he's not, like, the Cheerios bee or somethin'.
Hey, do ya think after this you can come clean up my uncle's RV? I mean, it's not terrible, but if you're as good at cleanin' as your commercials say...
Ha! I knew ghosts were real! I mean, if zombies and vampires are real, why wouldn't ghosts be? But who would'a thought they'd be so cute?
Oh, hang on, lemme remember that thing La Dragonesa says at the start of her matches. It's, uh... Tengamos un partido justo! Pretty sure that means "I'm gonna kick your butt!"

♪You're insane, you are bad, you wreck everything you touch and you're a sociopath, and the only way to mitigate would be to know the date you're scheduled to vacate, when are you going to die? Look me in the eye, tell me when you'll die!♪
Oh, you're streamin' this? Awesome! More fame! What's up, internet! It's me, the real Critical Darling! I kinda suck at poker, so you're probably gonna see me naked! Tell your friends!
When you find your guy, lemme know and I'll ice 'em!
Aw come on! You've got two sets of wings? I don't even have one!
Paris? How the heck did I end up here? You can't get here in an RV!
Wait, what the heck, we're in Paris? How freakin' lost do ya gotta get to go from Seattle to Paris? In an RV, no less!
Okay, seriously, how the fuck did I end up in Paris? I was just torin' the US! In an RV! I'm freakin' the fuck out right now!

Gah ha! This is like that one bit: "Welcome to Hawaii! How'd you get here in a car?" 'Cept it's Paris, and my car is an RV! Also, there's no welcome sign! But seriously, how did I get here in an RV?...
Heh. Crowds don't bother me! I've been on stage and in the ring!
Pffft. Public nudity. Like I've never been to a bathhouse before!
♪All the broken glass reminds me of home! Brings up all the memories of long ago!♪... Er, that's a reference, by the way. I didn't come from a bad home...
Gah ha! I better not tell Charlotte where we played this! She'd be so mad!
It's no Enoshima Beach, but this place is nice!
Ooh, paparazzi! Here, I'll strike a sick pose for ya!
Ooh, paparazzi! Hey, is this a good pose, or do ya want a different one?
Aw man, who called the cops? I haven't even broken anything yet!
Aw man, it's too early for the cops. You're not supposed to show up 'til after my performance gets going!
Aw, the police? Is this about that motel room? I swear it was like that when we got there! Honest! It was just a really crappy motel!
Aw, the police? This ain't about that chair I broke at that motel, is it? I swear I didn't do it on purpose, the chair broke when I sat in it!
This reminds me of that one time I was playin' a show in my backyard, and someone called the cops, but the cops were into the music and started jammin' to it! No joke!
Uh, h-hey, lemme make it clear, I got powers, but I ain't a super hero! I swear! I'm just here to promote my band!
Ah! I'm not a super hero, I swear! I got ice powers, but I ain't lookin' for a fight! Promise! I just wanna promote my band!
I ain't here to turn anyone in! I-I'm not a super hero! I live for music, I swear!
Aw, is this some kinda sick joke? Three dudes with wings here? Well, at least that dude doesn't have wings either...
Wait what, we can show up naked?... Maybe I should'a done that...?
Yoooo! It's me, Critical Darling, comin' at'cha as live as can be! Who's ready to rock?
'Sup? Who's ready to get their butt handed to 'em by me and my ice powers?... Oh, this ain't a fight...?

I'm gonna rock your faces off and win that prize money!... Oh, there's no prize?... Well, I'll still rock your faces off, and then... you can tell your friends, or somethin'...

If ya haven't heard of me... well, I don't blame ya. It's hard to get famous, man!
Hey, if any of ya have actually heard of me or my band before, I'll give ya a free boob flash before we start! No lyin', now! We're usin' the honor system!

Heh heh! This plan is brilliant! None of y'all will be able to forget me or my band once ya see me naked, and y'all won't be able to resist tellin' your friends! It's the best marketing campaign in the world!

♪Once again we got suffocated in a sick perversion of a spider's web!♪ Well, I got the perverted part right, but I'm pretty sure we're not stuck in a spider's web!
Good thing y'all got me and not that Nero Forte guy! I hear he's a real downer. Also he's dead, so he wouldn't be any fun anyway!
Good thing y'all got me and not Elevator Girl! She's all stoic and stuff. Totally not fun to hang around. Plus, she doesn't even have elevator powers. Lame!
Good thing y'all got me and not, like, Dr. Worm or something! He's not a real doctor but he is a real worm -- like, an actual worm! I've seen him in person! He's crazy!

I'll take your bet, and you're gonna regret, cuz I'm the best there's ever been!
♪On a cold winter morning, in the time before the light, in flames of death's eternal reign we ride towards the fight!♪
♪All my life I've been over the top, I don't know what I'm doing all I know is I don't wanna stop!♪
I'm probably not the Ibuki you're hopin' for, but I hope you enjoy playin' with me anyway!
This line keeps track of how many times you've played with me so I can thank ya for it later!
♪Now the world is gone, I'm just one! Oh God, help me! Hold my breath as I wish for death! Oh please, God, help me!♪
♪We are the one! Together! We are the only one! Your are the one! Forever!♪
♪I need just one~!♪
Heh! Even when I'm not tryin', I can still kick butt! I don't need any cards!
Gah! Why couldn't I have been this lucky when life decided what powers I'd get...?
These ~cards.text~ are ♪more than I thought they could be, so I'm setting them free!♪
I'll banish these ~cards.text~ from my hand ♪to a life beyond the stars!♪
♪Exit bad cards! Enter new cards! Take my hand! We're off to never neverland!♪

♪Second chances they don't ever matter, people never change! Once a whore you're nothing more, I'm sorry, that'll never change! And about forgiveness, we're both supposed to have exchanged♪ -- Oh right! Exchange! I need ~cards.text~!
Gimme ~cards.text~! Don't think, just play! Just like playin' the drums!
Gah, it's hard for me to want to throw my hands. I still kinda want to win...
Uh, gimme ~cards.text~, I guess, I dunno.
Sorry, you ~cards.text~, you're outta the band -- er, hand!
♪Reaching out for the hand of God, but did you think you'd shake your own?!♪
♪Whoa! It was never my intention to brag! To steal it all away from you now!♪
♪Hello, hand! We all salute you, hand! Five cards strong, it's good to have you back again!♪
Pffft! I knew learnin' poker tactics was a waste of time! I didn't need any practice!
I traded poker skill for guitar skill and it still worked out!
Man, if playin' poker is this easy, I feel bad for anyone who spent time tryin' to get good at it instead of gettin' good at somethin' else!
This hand should work! Yeah!... No... Maybe? I don't know. Can you repeat the question?
♪Grade on a curve, and you'll observe, I'm right below the horizon!♪
On a scale from Gilgamesh to Hammurabi, this hand is pretty Ashurbanipal.
Man, this hand is so Ashurbanipal that it's tellin' me my haircut makes me look like a Mohenjo-daroan!
♪In our darkest dreams we do believe our destiny this time!♪ Especially cuz I don't care if I win or lose!
♪This song doesn't have any words but these ones! And these ones! And these ones! And these ones! And these ones!♪
♪Minotaur-taur, tiny minotaur-taur, little minotaur-taur, mini minotaur-taur! Minotaur-taur, tiny minotaur-taur, little minotaur-taur, mini minotaur-taur!♪
♪Chicken nugget biscuit, nugget in a biscuit! Nugget, biscuit, nugget in a biscuit!♪ Dang, made myself hungry...
♪As the red day is dawning, and the lightning cracks the sky, they'll raise their hands to the heavens above with resentment in their eyes!♪
♪You wanna sing, to drown out the car horn, squeeze your eyes shut and scream like a new born, like new born babe!♪
♪Fuck! Fuck! Fuuuuuuuuck...♪ I'm not really upset, I just thought that'd be a funny reference.
♪Life is a misery, don't know how it's come to be! Death, the epitome of all of our days!♪
♪No one in the world ever gets what they want and that is beautiful! Everybody dies frustrated and sad and that is beautiful!♪
I ain't even worried! The more I lose, the more you'll remember me!
GRRRRRRRAH! Cough cough! Ow! I suck at death growls...
Look like this game has officially become a duel. Good thing we're not playin' guitars here, or else you'd be doomed!
I haven't even been on a regular date, let alone a Christmas one...
Huh. I dunno. I guess I could make ya somethin' outta ice to hide behind if it's a problem for ya.
Heh, what music don't I listen to? I listen to whatever's good, that's what I listen to!
Ah, you're like the people chain up in the cave in the allegory of the people in the cave by the Greek guy!
Dunno about anyone else, but I don't gotta do that. Everything is either rockin', or somethin' I gotta do before rockin', so there's always motivation!
Ya won't get mad if I say ya got a big butt, right? Cuz ya do, but it ain't a bad thing!
Whoa whoa! Hey, you're done! You don't gotta take more off!
Uh, yeah, ya do like boys, right?
Ha! Card battles! Who needs that when ya can fight with your fists!... And ice powers too.
Why do I get the feelin' you're one'a those people who'd use wrestling as a way of learnin' her powers?
Hey, your cards remind me, Cherry Bomb once told me she almost debuted as a fighter with magic Hanafuda cards, but she couldn't get them to do what she wanted so she switched to fireworks!
Sorry, you ain't the first zombie I've met.
Hmmm, I dunno. On the one hand, it could inspire a new song, but on the other, that's time I could spend praticin'...
Ah, nope, sorry. History was always my weakest subject...
Do statues count as "artifacts?" Cuz I've always liked lookin' at naked statues. Some sculpters really know how to sculpt a penis...
♪The statue got me high! The statue got me high! The truth is where the sculptor's chisel chipped away the lie!♪
♪A rock that spoke a word! An animated mineral, it can be heard! And though I once preferred a human being's company, they pale before the monolith that towers over me!♪
Yo, Faye, can ya stop wavin' that gun around, please? I ain't bullet proof!
Try "orange blue orange yellow orange blue orange yellow!"
I dunno what Stilton cheese is, but caviar ain't common, and cheese and crackers ain't a meal.
Sounds messy! I like it! I don't gotta do anything nearly so involved to make my ice powers work!
Ah, wait! Komi-san, nihongo wa hanasemasu ka?
I dunno how obvious it is, but I ain't exactly an art gallery chick, y'know what I mean?
Well, I am gettin' hungry for tacos. But when am I ever not hungry for tacos?
You're gonna have to be more specific than that. Who is your artist? What do they look like?
It's all good, Galatea. As long as their ain't ill intent behind your words, I can't get mad.
I'm a musician! Of course I face critics! Though, I've never encountered an actual critics, just club owners and crowds!
Nope, sorry. I was raised Shinto, but I dunno if it even stuck!
Not always, but sometimes. That's why I got my dog, Pearl!
Yo, Ringo, I'm Ibuki. Wait, did I introduce myself already...?
Where do ya live, Yusuke? I might be able to take ya there.
A sale, huh? I should probably get in on that...

condition.saying: On one hand, I desire to see everyone disrobe, but the caveat of the forfeit is something I simply cannot look forward to.

case.state: Huh, really? Why's that? Why look at naked people if you're not gonna get off to 'em?
I don't got any scars. Even after that one time I fell out of a tree and got a big slash on my leg, it didn't leave a scar!
I, uh... I dunno... I don't got any "play strip poker with 'em" kinda loved ones...
Ramen. Literally! Gah ha!... My tour budge sucks...
I dunno about stupid-lookin', but I can say I don't like it. Too traditional for my tastes.
Deck? Like, cards? I ain't a card person.
I ain't one to tell people what song is in their heart, but if I were you? I'd start playin' metal -- or at least start a zombie-flavored pop subgenre.
Ah, that's easy, guitar duel! As long as my opponent ain't, like, Herman Lee or whatevs, I bet I could win!
Movies?... Uh... I dunno, what are they playin' right now...?
Does wrestling count if it's the TV kind and not the school kind? Otherwise, my answer's "nope."
Can't say I have. I ain't normally a gambler!
I drove here in an RV! Well, I didn't drive it, our band's bassist did. I don't got my license!

Oh, geez, I ain't qualified to answer questions like that... But if the world is at stake, wouldn't tryin' leave the one guy alive defeat the point, cuz they'd die with the rest of the world too, right...?
A guy at one'a my last shows told us about it. He left out the part about strippin', but I was smart enough to do my research before comin' here!
I dunno if I should be more surprised you're a goddess or concerned that the one actual goddess I have proof of isn't one I've ever heard of before...
Aw man! Your power is so cool! Yet another power that would'a been cooler to have than ice...
Recently I saw this video of a bird groovin' to different songs. So cute!
Wha-- I've never killed! I'm just a rocker! Rocker's ain't got no reason to kill!
Heck yeah, do some dancin'! It's like you're one'a those caged ladies!
